title: Sum of two numbers
description: Given two integers a and b, find their sum

title: Step 1
description: Declare a variable to store the sum of two numbers

title: Step 2
description: Add the two numbers and store the result in the variable

title: Hint 1
description: You can use the '+' operator to add two numbers

title: Multiply two numbers
description: Given two integers a and b, find their product
